item.description:
The Cambridge Brewing Co. is a great venue with great homemade beer and food. It's located in Kendall Sq., about 1 mile away from our last venue, The Asgard Irish Pub in Cambridge.

http://www.cambrew.co...

Let's keep it an open-ended discussion, and continue to discuss some of the topics that came up in January's Meetup:

- Themes: Favorite themes, where to find them, and theme design principles
- Blog SEO
- E-commerce and WordPress
- Social networking, Web 2.0, and web design trends in general

Look forward to seeing you all!
item.name: Blogging @ The Brewery
